night.text: Overcast with light rain in places. Locally misty. Southeast wind 6-11, on coast in gusts 15 m/s. Air temperature 1..6°C.
night.sea: Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 19:00 UTC Nov 10 to 19:00 UTC Nov 11 2018.Weather summary: High over Russia strengthening, area of Low over Northern Atlantic.Warnings:Gulf of Finland, Northern Baltic: southeast in gusts to 15 m/s . Wave height 1 to 2 m. Northern Gulf of Riga, Moonsund: southeast in gusts to 15 m/s . Wave height 1 to 2 m, in Moonsund to 0,8 m. Northern Baltic: southeast 7 to 12, in gusts to 15 m/s, by day 9 to 14, in gusts 18 m/s. Wave height 1 to 2 m, by day 2 to 3 m. Locally rain. Visibility moderate.Gulf of Finland, Moonsund, Northern Gulf of Riga: southeast 6 to 12, in gusts to 15 m/s, by day in gusts 17 m/s. Wave height 1 to 2 m, Moonsund 0,8 m. Locally rain. Visibility moderate.
night.peipsi: Southeast wind 8-12 m/s. Wave height 1-1,5 m. Locally some rain. Visibility moderate. Air temperature 4..6°C.

day.text: Overcast with light rain in places. Southeast wind 8-13, on coast in gusts 17 m/s. Air temperature 3..8°C.
day.peipsi: Southeast wind 8-12, in gusts 15 m/s. Wave height 1-1,7 m. Locally some rain. Visibility moderate. Air temperature 4..6°C.

night.text: Overcast. Locally light rain. Southeast wind 6-12, on coast in gusts up to 17 m/s. Air temperature 1..6°C.

day.text: Overcast. In the morning rain is starting from islands, by day in eastern part sleet too. Southeast, south wind 6-12, on coast in gusts up to 17 m/s. Air temperature 1..6, on islands to 8°C.

night.text: Overcast. Mostly rain. South wind 5-11, on northern coast in gusts 15 m/s. Air temperature 3..8°C.

day.text: Overcast and rainy. In the morning southeast, south wind is increasing 8-13, in gusts 15-18 m/s, in the evening becoming southwest and decreasing. Air temperature 5..10°C.

night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Locally rain. Mainly southwest wind 3-9 m/s. Air temperature 2..7°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Locally rain. Mainly southwest wind 3-9 m/s. Air temperature 5..9°C.
